channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: The light opposite No 28 Wimborne Avenue hasn’t been fixed despite several attempts to get it done., 18th February
item.description:
Light opposite No 28 is now OVERDUE. Please can you send a technician out.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 47, Kevington Drive, St Paul's Cray, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Several potholes., 18th February
item.description:
Several potholes as you go down towards Crystal Palace. One is major over 10 inch right at the junction of Crown dale and Beulah Hill
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 7, Crown Dale, Upper Norwood, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Clothes dumped on steps joining Plum Lane and Plumstead Common Road, 18th February
item.description:
Clothes have been strewn across the steps joining Plum Lane and Plumstead Common Road, making them difficult to use and hazardous. This has been there since yesterday morning.
Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Plumstead Common Road, Plumstead
Report on FixMyStreet

item.description:
Noticed today. See pics. Looks like needs urgent repair.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 57, Petersham Drive, St Paul's Cray, Greater London

item.title: Missing litter bin, 18th February
item.description:
The litter bin which has always been here is missing. People are now dumping rubbish where the bin was, and your staff are ignoring it. The dog waste bins were removed, so it's important to provide adequate bins. Please replace the bin.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Tynemouth Road, Plumstead
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Fly tipping on Frederick Place corner into Burrage Road, 18th February
item.description:
Photos taken 18th February 2026. The fly tipper was kind enough to leave their name and address on the rubbish dumped.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Burrage Road, Plumstead
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Mattress fly-tipped on the pavement, 18th February
item.description:
Double mattress dumped on pavement of Madeline Road adjacent to Brooklyn House

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 3, Madeline Road, Crystal Palace, Greater London

item.title: Surface water pooling, 18th February
item.description:
A resident has asked that "...sort out the lake that appears in Perry street just down from the church by the field every time it rains!, It's been like it for 10 years!!" is fixed. I haven't seen this personally, just conveying information, albeit second hand. Apologies not to have first-hand information, nor photographs. Thank you.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Perry Street, Crayford, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Leaf and drainage neglect, 18th February
item.description:
On a yearly basis, I find myself clearing significant accumulation of leaves from the pavement and this year the drainage gully outside our property because it is left unattended for a very extended period. This year, the blockage has reached a point where drainage is impeded and making it difficult to exit from the car/road to the pavement.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Upper Elmers End Road, Elmers End, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Blue lidded bin has been dumped, 18th February
item.description:
This bin was left months ago and contains a lot of mixed waste. It is not marked with a house number. I believe it was dumped with rubbish in it.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Birchington Close, Barnehurst, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Riley Road, Old Kent Road, Greater London

item.title: Huge potholes, 18th February
item.description:
Multiple potholes on the slip road, going up to the flyerover, crumbling road between the 2 lanes as you come onto the slip road, then further up a huge pothole that could now fit a tyre into it (due to it being there for months with no sign of repair) and another forming right next to it now, which means you need to swerve to avoid them. This is extremly dangerous.
Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Cole Close, Thamesmead
Report on FixMyStreet

item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Riley Road, Old Kent Road, Greater London

item.title: Carpet and bags of clothing, 18th February
item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Fieldfare Road, Greater London
